name: Nyra's Cave
description:
All assets were created by us within the time frame. Not that it's much to brag about.

Credits

  • Programming - UhGoomba, ApolloPlease
  • Level Design - ThePoisonDartFrog
  • Art - Nogwat
  • Music - Smokepincher

We do plan on making a few updates to this game and fixing the jank. If you want to hear about it, contact: UhGoomba#0347 (Discord)
